title: GPS simulator Weather API SPA
desc: Lab8 SPA project of PROG8470 IOS development of Conestoga College. This app uses GPS to simulate location, and use the location to generate http request and send to OpenWeather, after getting the json response, use it to set view of screen.

title: EntityFrameworkCore's [one to one], [one to many] and [many to many] relationship
desc: This article is based on the https://sliu9412.notion.site/Create-ASP-NET-API-App-29abdc4cd5184e91a387a102d6f86a23?pvs=4. To make the testing easier, I have already make the dbservice as in-meory database.

title: "KW development bank" UX prototype
desc: KW Development Bank is a financial service application that has been developed to cater to the financial needs of the users of Waterloo and Kitchener regions of Ontario, Canada. This application provides a range of financial services such as card management, money transfer, financial investment, and many more.

title: Data driven React Personal Website
desc: This a template project built by react, the data is store in JSON files, the main content of pages can be modified easily.

title: SQLiteOpenHelper Grocery App
desc: This project incorporates Database, Tables and CRUD operations using SQLiteOpenHelper class. The app's target is keeping track of the products and customers via drawerLayout and Fragments.

title: Asp.net CRUD User API
desc: This is the project for the Lab3 for Conestoga College PROG8185-23S-Sec1-Web Technologies. It's a simple web api application for user accounts CRUD.

title: Android Card View Restautants
desc: This application use scroll view to display 5 resautants by card view.

title: HRPrima Employee Management App (Multi-language Support)
desc: This project bases on the "HRPrima app" created in class. The main work of task 6 is making the "Add Employee" page support different languages. After editing the different versions values/strings.xml, now the app can display simplified Chinese.

title: Android Online Grocery Store SPA
desc: This is the a individual project for the Task1 for Conestoga College PROG8485-Mobile Application Development.

title: PHP Online store API project
desc: This is the project for the Assignment2 for Conestoga College PROG8185-23S-Sec1-Web Technologies, it's build by Siyu Liu, Eugenio Contreras Lizana, Asad Ullah Ashraf and Akshat Arora.

title: GPS Simulator SPA
desc: Lab7 UIKit project of PROG8470 IOS development of Conestoga College. This SPA project use MapKit api and MKMapView to simulate location and other info.

title: TypeScript React Online Store
desc: This is the project for the Assignment1 for Conestoga College PROG8185-23S-Sec1-Web Technologies. It's build by Siyu Liu, Eugenio Contreras Lizana, Asad Ullah Ashraf and Akshat Arora.

title: Delicia Beverage Online Store Form
desc: The assignment 1 of PROG8485 Mobile Application development, is creating an order form SPA for a retail store named "Delicia Beverage". The content of this project consists of EditText, Radio Group, AutoCompleteTextView etc. When tapping the submit buttonï¼Œif the inputed data is valid, it will display a toast message to display the info.

title: Laptop & Monitor Store
desc: Assignment2 project of PROG8470 IOS development of Conestoga College. This app can add laptop into tableView, but the monitor is unavailable.

title: Short Stories App for Children
desc: Lab5 UIKit project of PROG8470 IOS development of Conestoga College. This project has multiple storeboards with very short stories for diffrent age group children.

title: Design Pro Form SPA
desc: The midterm exam project of Conestoga College PROG8485 Mobile Application Development. The project's layout, including the xml files are provided by the professor, while the main work for students is finishing the Java code to meet the demands on eConestoga. This project just should be finished within 3 hours.

title: Previous Projects Combination Application
desc: Final Exam project of PROG8470 IOS development of Conestoga College. This app combine previous projects together, to list them in a tableView, tap can navigate to target storyboard.

title: "SMS" Online Store prototype
desc: This application is an online clothing website based on PC browsers, and the name of the clothing store is "SMS". The focus of this project is on young people, with a focus on light luxury and mid-to-high-end fashion.

title: PHP Lab2 Mysql PDO
desc: PROG8185-23S-Sec1-Web Technologies' Lab2, for exercising how to manipulate local mysql databases by php PDO.

title: Multiple Storyboards Project
desc: The midterm exam project of PROG8470 IOS development of Conestoga College. This app consists of navigation bar and bottom tab bar, can navigate to different storyboards.

title: SharedPreferences Data Storing and Tetrieving Project
desc: This application uses an activity named "DetailsActivity". When entering info of three fields into the form and tap the submit button, it will jump to another activity, the data using SharedPreferences to store and retrieved by the second activity.

title: Form Submission SPA
desc: Lab3 SPA project of PROG8470 IOS development of Conestoga College, it's a form to let user to submit, then the textfield will display user's inputted information.

title: Triangle Solver Test Project
desc: This is the project for the Assignment 2 of PROG8170-23S-Sec1-Software Quality Assurance Technology, to test a console program via NUnit framework.

title: Todo List SPA
desc: Lab6 SPA project of PROG8470 IOS development of Conestoga College. The data source of this app is UserDefaults, the stored data will be displayed in tableView.

title: Grocery Store Home Page
desc: This project is the in class exercise of PROG8150-23W-Sec1-User Interface Design Principles, I designed this Lau's grocery and got 98% of 100% as a result.

title: Auto Layout SPA
desc: Lab4 SPA project of PROG8470 IOS development of Conestoga College. If the device is rotated from profile orientation to landscape orientation, the distance of element on the screen will not be changed.

title: Simple Calculator
desc: Lab2 SPA project of PROG8470 IOS development, it's a simple calculator to increase/decrease 1 or 2 number.
